name: Gigamart CRM Batch
description: Batch ingestion of CRM CSV exports from GCS to BigQuery raw layer (giga_raw.raw_crm_customers).

parameters.name: input_pattern
parameters.label: Input GCS pattern
parameters.helpText: GCS file pattern for CRM exports (e.g. gs://<bucket>/crm/*.csv)

parameters.name: output_table
parameters.label: Output table
parameters.helpText: BigQuery table for raw CRM customers (e.g. <project>:giga_raw.raw_crm_customers)

parameters.name: dead_letter_table
parameters.label: Dead-letter table
parameters.helpText: Optional BigQuery table for failed CRM records (e.g. <project>:giga_raw.raw_crm_customers_dlq). If not set, errors are only logged.
